column2: the mushroom fries were a disappointment. The mushrooms we cut into large slices
column4: and brought out with this amazing spicy dipping sauce. The mushroom "fries"
column6: had absorbed much of the oil
column7: did not have a pleasant texture or flavor--the group of us tried to get through some of them
column8: but in the end it felt like we were struggling to eat them by slathering the dipping sauce which contained all of this great complex flavor. The restaurant understood
column11: so props to them for being great customer-service wise!
